EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-XLE-C0004O-Finance.Email 2_Public-private hybrid cloud infographic
EmailTemplate.subject: Nokia helps your top and bottom lines with an overlay cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Optimize your operations with a Nokia cloud solution Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Before you choose an enterprise cloud solution you’ll want to know how it will improve your business.
But don’t get lost in all of the techno-babble about the cloud. Get our infographic “Why is cloud a vital topic for enterprises” <[[http://resources.nokia.com/asset/200881?did=d000000000af&utm_campaign=gamechanger&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email2b-hybridcloudinfographic&utm_term=finance]]> and get clear, straightforward facts about how a private cloud can actually help your business. The infographic discusses key business challenges that can be addressed by an enterprise cloud — and the business benefits.
I hope that you enjoy the infographic! Michael Williams
Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
